representation_information.name: OpenDocument Database Front End Document Format (ODB), Version 1.2. Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
representation_information.description: An XML-based format for a database front end that is editable. File extension .odb is used for a free-standing database front end document. May be embedded within other document formats in the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family. Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
